<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for(Iterator<Map.Entry<Integer, Integer>> it = Yoghurts.getHashMap().entrySet().iterator(); it.hasNext(); ){
int location = it.next().getKey();
}
<<<explanation>>>: You're trying to get the first key of a LinkedHashMap using an iterator, but the type of the iterator is not compatible with the type of the first key. Instead, you can use the entrySet() method to get a Set of all the entries in the LinkedHashMap, and then use the iterator() method on the Set to get the first key.
